name: Sweet Victory
description:
Sweet Victory is a 4 player multiplayer party game where you have to collect the most sugar! Pick up items to battle other players and help you collect sugar!

The game supports up to 4 players. Currently, the game only supports connection by IP. 

WASD: Movement

Left mouse: Use Item

Space: Jump / Hover / Glide

C: Emote menu

This was a capstone project for Depaul University Capstone.

Made by: FTB Studios

Jacob Fragoso - Environmental art, Modeling, textures

Chris Hofmann - Prototyping, Networking code, Gameplay

(me) - Lobby, networking, and player controller

Justin Kuo - Gameplay, design, UI

Mark Tangalin - Producer, designer

Chi Yeung - Designer, Concept art, 2D art, Character Modeler
